title: The Stuff of Legend, Book 3: A Jester's Tale
description:
Continuing the saga of the New York Times Bestselling Graphic Novel! Following the shocking revelations of The Stuff of Legend Volume 2: The Jungle, Jester embarks on a solo quest that will take him to the farthest corners of the Dark. High seas adventure awaits in The Stuff of Legend: A Jester''s Tale #1!Book Details: 
   Format: Paperback 
   Publication Date: 3/27/2012 
   Pages: 124
author: Mike Raicht
